description: Modeled and textured props and characters on commission for platforms like Workana, Fiverr, and UpWork.
2D Animator for the animated intro “Suegra Modelo,” a YouTube channel with podcast content featuring model and TV presenter Cati Caballero and her son-in-law Mateo.
achievements: Designed main characters (Cati and Mateo) with their respective animation guides.
Created complete 2D animated shots, from Rough to Clean.
Inked and colored the animated shots.
Contributed to the script and development of the intro.

description: Participated in the animated short film “Carrusel” (“Un Vals Así”), inspired by the life and work of Peruvian composer Jorge Madueño.
achievements: Modelar escenarios y props 3D de diferentes locaciones del distrito de Barranco (Lima, Perú) realizados en Autodesk Maya y Blender.
Textured props with Toon Shader style in Blender (Grease Pencil).
Created storyboards for some scenes of the short film.
Conducted 2D animation tests for the main character.

description: Developed skills in 2D and 3D techniques for film, advertising, and video games.
achievements: Junior Animator for the 2D animated pilot “Luchín Gonzales” 2020.
General Director of the 2D short film “La Magia Perdida” 2021.
General Director of the 3D short film “Inmersive” 2022-2023.
